name: Greenspace
description:
Greenspace puts you in the role of the sole survivor of a ruined space station. With every breath bringing you closer to asphyxiation, your goal is to reclaim areas & fill them with life-giving plants. To do so, you must clear the station of debris & destroy space junk and asteroids for materials.

If you just like the vibe, choose endless mode & experience the mood!

How to Play:
Move with Arrow Keys
Look with mouse
Destroy crates & space objects with Left click to gather Material, Soil, and Moisture.
Build hydrobays by left clicking on empty "sleds" in the station. They take 2 soil & 4 materials to build while providing 4 oxygen & consuming 2 water.

Have fun!
